00070             function                filledrectangle( $image , $x1 , $y1 , $x2 , $y2 , $color , $thick = 1 )
00071             {
00072                   $t = $thick / 2 - 0.5;
00073                   
00074                   return(
00075                         imagefilledrectangle( 
00076                               $image , round( min( $x1 , $x2 ) - $t ) , round( min( $y1 , $y2 ) - $t ) , 
00077                               round( max( $x1 , $x2 ) + $t ) , round( max( $y1 , $y2 ) + $t ) , $color 
00078                         )
00079                   );
00080             }
00081             
00124             function          imagelinethick( $image , $x1 , $y1 , $x2 , $y2 , $color , $thick = 1 )
00125             {
00126                 if( $thick == 1 )
00127                   {
00128                         return( imageline( $image , $x1 , $y1 , $x2 , $y2 , $color ) );
00129                   }
00130                 elseif( $x1 == $x2 || $y1 == $y2 )
00131                   {
00132                     return( $this->filledrectangle( $image , $x1 , $y1 , $x2 , $y2 , $color , $thick ) );
00133                 }
00134                   
00135                   $t = $thick / 2 - 0.5;
00136                 $k = ( $y2 - $y1 ) / ( $x2 - $x1 );
00137                   $a = $t / sqrt( 1 + pow( $k , 2 ) );
00138                 $points = array(
00139                     round( $x1 - ( 1 + $k ) * $a ) , round( $y1 + ( 1 - $k ) * $a ) , round( $x1 - ( 1 - $k ) * $a ) , 
00140                         round( $y1 - ( 1 + $k ) * $a ) , round( $x2 + ( 1 + $k ) * $a ) , round( $y2 - ( 1 - $k ) * $a ) , 
00141                     round( $x2 + ( 1 - $k ) * $a ) , round( $y2 + ( 1 + $k ) * $a ) , 
00142                 );
00143                   
00144                 imagefilledpolygon( $image , $points , 4 , $color );
00145                 return( imagepolygon( $image , $points , 4 , $color ) );
00146             }
00147       }
